mapper.select: SELECT id, store_num, storeroom_num, storeroom_name, area, danger_level, quota_dosage, quota_people FROM storeroom WHERE id = #{id} LIMIT 1
SELECT id, store_num, storeroom_num, storeroom_name, area, danger_level, quota_dosage, quota_people FROM storeroom WHERE storeroom_num = #{storeroomNum} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO storeroom (store_num, storeroom_num, storeroom_name, area, danger_level, quota_dosage, quota_people, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{storeNum}, #{storeroomNum}, #{storeroomName}, #{area}, #{dangerLevel}, #{quotaDosage}, #{quotaPeople}, NOW(3), NOW(3))
mapper.update: UPDATE storeroom SET store_num = #{storeNum}, storeroom_num = #{storeroomNum}, storeroom_name = #{storeroomName}, area = #{area}, danger_level = #{dangerLevel}, quota_dosage = #{quotaDosage}, quota_people = #{quotaPeople}, updated_at = NOW(3) WHERE id = #{id}
